mapper.select: SELECT course.name as cname,teacher.name tname,classes.id AS classid,classes.week,classes.classroom FROM classes_student,classes,course,teacher WHERE classes_student.classid=classes.id AND classes.cid=course.id AND classes.tid=teacher.id AND classes_student.sid=#{sid}

SELECT classes_student.sid, student.name as sname,classes.cid, classes.classroom, classes_student.seat, score.usual_performance FROM student,classes_student,classes,score WHERE classes_student.classid=classes.id AND score.sid=classes_student.sid=student.id AND score.sid=classes.cid
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM classes_student WHERE seat=#{seat} and classid=#{classid}
mapper.update: UPDATE classes_student SET seat=#{seat} WHERE sid=#{sid} AND classid=#{classid}
UPDATE classes_student SET seat=null WHERE seat=#{seat} and classid=#{classid}
UPDATE classes_student SET seat=null WHERE sid=#{sid} and classid=#{classid}
UPDATE classes_student SET seat=null where classid=#{classid}
